text: Dr. Vladimír Székely (January 11, 1941 – November 13, 2020) was a Hungarian electrical engineer. He was professor emeritus at the Budapest University of Technology and Economics. In 2010, he became a member of the Hungarian Academy of Sciences. He published research results in 360 peer-reviewed papers listed in Web of Science.V. Szekely and T. Van Bien, “Fine-Structure of Heat Flow Path in Semiconductor Devices – a Measurement and Identification Method” in: Solid-State Electronics Volume: 31 Issue: 9 Pages: 1363-1368 : Sept 1988 He was best known for his works relating to the electro-thermal phenomena simulation and test. Székely died on November 13, 2020 in Budapest at the age of 79.Elhunyt Székely Vladimír ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian engineers Category:Scientists from Budapest Category:Electrical engineers
title: Vladimír Székely
